nodes.text: Star Wars Trilogy: Apprentice of the Force
Star Wars Trilogy: Apprentice of the Force is a 2004 Game Boy Advance platform game which includes A New Hope, The Empire Strikes Back, and Return of the Jedi.
This game follows the adventures of Luke Skywalker in the original trilogy. You only play as Luke in this game.
There is also a bonus survival mode where you fight against enemies from all three episodes, but this level can only be played after completing the game.
